definition.name: O_admissible_family
definition.definition: For a transfer system O on G, define Sub_O^tr(G) = {H <= G : the transfer tr_H^G is a morphism in O}. The O-admissible family F_O is the family of subgroups generated by Sub_O^tr(G), i.e., the smallest collection closed under subconjugacy containing Sub_O^tr(G). Note: Sub_O^tr(G) itself may not be a family for a general incomplete transfer system.
